parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: The entity type. Set the value to Module.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 50. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegistrationId
parameters.description: The ID of the registration record.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. The resource type can contain letters, digits, colons (:), and asterisks (\*). You can use an asterisk (\*) to perform a fuzzy match.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The registration state. Valid values:

*   IN_PROGRESS
*   COMPLETE
*   FAILED
